alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 3:53PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM FRIDAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM Friday to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with widespread winter driving conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley
